title: Fascle
description: Developed Fascle, a responsive dashboard application using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js), showcasing advanced UI/UX and performance features including dynamic sorting, pagination, filtration, and debounced search. Integrated Cloudinary for secure image hosting.

title: AnimeFy (MERN-Stack)
description: A dynamic interface for watching anime trailers and accessing detailed anime info. Includes admin dashboard for uploading content and managing users, implemented with ReactJS and TailwindCSS.

title: My Portfolio (MERN Stack)
description: A full-featured portfolio website with an integrated admin panel for dynamic content management, authentication, and cloud image management.

title: Task Manager (MERN Stack)
description: Task management app with secure authentication using JWT, CRUD operations for tasks, Redux Toolkit for state management, and responsive UI.

title: AI-Info-Generator (MERN)
description: An AI generator supporting summarization, text-to-paragraph, sci-fi image generation, code generation, and chatbot using OpenAI API with JWT authentication.

title: E-Commerce Web-App (MERN)
description: A full-featured eCommerce platform with Redux Toolkit for state management, JWT authentication, Stripe payment integration, and admin panel for product and user management.

title: Zip-Code-Information (React JS)
description: Fetches detailed location info based on postal codes using third-party API, with map integration and responsive UI built with React, Redux Toolkit, and TailwindCSS.

title: Telegram Clone
description: UI clone of Telegram app with search filter and dark mode toggle, built with ReactJS and TailwindCSS.

title: Baller Dashboard
description: Dashboard built with ReactJS, Redux Toolkit, json-server for dummy API, and TailwindCSS for responsive design.

title: Blood Bank (MERN Stack)
description: A blood donation and request platform with JWT authentication, Redux Toolkit for state management, and data visualization with React-Chart.

title: EducFy
description: Responsive college portal with course listings, faculty profiles, and event calendar, designed for seamless user experience.

title: Dr Appointment System
description: Users can book appointments with doctors, and admins can manage users and doctors via a dashboard.
